    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Basic Witch Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=1867) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 154 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Witch](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=44)

**Prerequisites**
[Witch Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1866)

</column>

---

You gain the [basic spellcasting benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=170). Each time you gain a spell slot of a new level from the witch archetype, add two common spells of that level to your familiar.

<title level="2">Basic Witch Spellcasting leads to...</title>
[Expert Witch Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=1871), [Patron's Breadth](/Feats.aspx?ID=1870)
